channel.title: How?
channel.description:
how do i make it so any client can connect to my server not just my client
i have a bluurr's based client and i want some one using mopars client to be able to connect

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I never use delta, so I can’t. :o

Just download another delta based source and see if the same problem happens.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

you both don’t get it and its my fault i did not make it crystal clear.

user1 has my client and connects fine

user2 has different client and the signal gets rejected

user1 connects and my command prompt says

Connection from (IP):61354
[client-1-user1]: Loading process Completed   [Has powers, lag: 3 ms]

where as user2 logs in and in the command prompt says

connection from (ip):61322
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (ip)

any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

mod mortl:

you have no idea what you talking about just make sure you do what i say and match all your stuff to your jdk setup or config.

Wow… I am not going to even post here anymore due to your lack of knowledge. By the way, he isn’t asking how to set up his server, hes asking about the client connecting to the server.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

mod mortl:

well use the website www.no-ip.com this will help you out and thats what you should always use if you need any help more on that pm me:D

You have no clue what your talking about, if you want other clients to connect make sure you don’t have a UID set in your server, make sure the ID or all your items, objects, interfaces, ect, match so that they don’t cause crashes, or nulls. When I say match, make sure that the bluur client can have the same IDs as the Moparscape client.

Read full topic
